text: Belgium participated in the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics in Singapore. The Belgian squad consisted of 52 athletes competing in 16 sports: aquatics (swimming), archery, athletics, canoeing, cycling, equestrian, gymnastics, hockey, judo, rowing, sailing, table tennis, taekwondo, tennis, triathlon and volleyball.http://www.olympic.be/Spelen/Olympischejeugdspelen/BelgianDelegationYOGSingapore2010/tabid/268/language/nl- NL/Default.aspx ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font- size:90%" |- !
